action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

$ chmod -R 755 /var/www/html/*

$ cd /var/www/html/
$ git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git

$ mv -rf /var/www/html/uptick/* /var/www/html/
$ rm -rf /var/www/html/uptick

$ cd /var/www/html
$ npm build

action_list.name: action_install

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

$ chmod -R 755 /var/www/html/*

$ cd /var/www/html/
$ git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git

$ mv -rf /var/www/html/uptick/* /var/www/html/
$ rm -rf /var/www/html/uptick

$ cd /var/www/html
$ npm build
